info.mffs.cannot_harness: 无法从福特龙场中获取 %s FE。
info.mffs.field_permission.warp.tooltip: 允许玩家穿越并绕过力场。
info.mffs.field_permission.use_blocks.to: 允许玩家在方块中互动并打开图形用户界面。
允许玩家放置和破坏方块。
info.mffs.field_permission.bypass_defens: 允许玩家绕过干扰矩阵的限制。
info.mffs.field_permission.remote_contro: 允许玩家在防御区域内使用遥控器。
info.mffs.field_permission.bypass_confis: 允许玩家绕过禁制矩阵的没收。
info.mffs.interdiction_matrix.warning: [%s] 警告！您已接近扫描范围！
info.mffs.field_permission.configure_sec: 允许玩家配置生物识别标识符。
info.mffs.interdiction_matrix.no_entry: [%s] 请立即离开此区域。您无权进入。
info.mffs.interdiction_matrix.confiscati: [%s] 您的 %s 件物品已被没收。
[%s] 您的 %s 件物品已被没收。
info.mffs.handbook.title: 力场手册
info.mffs.handbook.landing_text: 欢迎来到游戏内的MFFS用户指南，旨在帮助您探索复杂的力场技术世界。力场、高科技机械和防御措施均包含在内。让我们开始吧！
info.mffs.show_details: 按住 %s 以获取详细信息
item.mffs.remote_controller.description: 提供对机器的远程访问。在潜行时使用机器进行链接。
item.mffs.custom_mode.too_far: 所选位置太远了！必须距离最多 %s 个方块。
item.mffs.disintegration_module.descript: Destroys blocks in place of the force field.
item.mffs.rotation_module.description: Rotates the field by a specific angle.
item.mffs.scale_module.description: Increases the scale of a certain component.
item.mffs.speed_module.description: Increases the speed of a device.
item.mffs.translation_module.description: Translates the field, displacing it away from the origin.
item.mffs.glow_module.description: Makes force field block emit light
item.mffs.silence_module.description: Silences the force field and prevents it from making sound.
item.mffs.shock_module.description: Touching the force field hurts entities.
item.mffs.sponge_module.description: Removes fluids from the force field's area
item.mffs.fusion_module.description: Joins overlapping force fields of the same frequency together
item.mffs.dome_module.description: Removes the bottom half of the force field
item.mffs.collection_module.description: Collects dropped blocks from the disintegration module.
item.mffs.stabilization_module.descripti: Stabilizes the projected force field and crystallizes the field into solid blocks. Place a chest next the projector with blocks to stablize the field.
item.mffs.inverter_module.description: Inverts the field to use negative space instead of the positive space.
item.mffs.block_alter_module.description: Prevents intruders from placing or breaking blocks.
item.mffs.block_access_module.descriptio: Prevents intruders from right clicking on blocks.
item.mffs.anti_friendly_module.descripti: Will cause Interdiction Matrix to kill all friendly mobs.
item.mffs.camouflage_module.description: Applies a custom model to force field blocks.
item.mffs.anti_hostile_module.descriptio: Will cause Interdiction Matrix to kill all hostile mobs.
item.mffs.anti_personnel_module.descript: Will cause Interdiction Matrix to kill all players.
item.mffs.anti_spawn_module.description: Prevents entities from spawning in a specific region.
item.mffs.id_card.description: Authorizes players in the Biometric Identifier. Use while sneaking to set identity
item.mffs.infinite_power_card.descriptio: A creative-only item that can be placed inside a capacitor for infinite energy.
item.mffs.frequency_card.description: Used for ease of frequency transmission. Use while sneaking to generate a random frequency.
screen.mffs.frequency.tooltip: Machines with the same frequency will share Fortron energy.
screen.mffs.matrix.tooltip: The projection matrix is used to determine how the projection should be created.
screen.mffs.fortron.name: Fortron:
screen.mffs.fortron.tooltip: Fortron is the type of force energy used in MFFS machines.
screen.mffs.rights.tooltip: Assign rights to the card to your left here.
screen.mffs.master.tooltip: The Master Card will denote the player in the card owner of the Biometric Identifier.
screen.mffs.copy.tooltip: Copy all data from the Rights slot to this card
advancements.mffs.root.title: Modular Force Field Systems
advancements.mffs.root.description: Enter the world of Force Fields!

advancements.mffs.smelt_steel.title: Harder than Iron
advancements.mffs.field_shock.title: A Shocking Experience
advancements.mffs.field_shock.descriptio: Get exterminated by a Force Field
advancements.mffs.projector.title: May the Force by with you!
advancements.mffs.sponge_module.title: Where's my water?
advancements.mffs.field_shape.title: Field Architect
advancements.mffs.camouflage.title: Hidden in plain sight
